display_long_description:
Enter a vibrant low-poly world where strategy meets hands-on VR action.

In this VR action strategy game, you don’t just place defenses — you control the battlefield with your own hands. Use motion controllers to aim attacks, activate portals, and manage powerful turrets in real time while waves of enemies try to overwhelm your base.

Portals allow enemies — and opportunities — to appear from unexpected directions, forcing you to think fast and reposition your strategy on the fly. Each encounter rewards precision, timing, and smart turret placement rather than passive watching.

Designed specifically for comfortable and intuitive VR gameplay, the game focuses on clear visuals, readable combat, and satisfying physics-based interactions. Easy to pick up, yet challenging to master.

Whether you enjoy tower defense, action-strategy hybrids, or active VR experiences, this game delivers a dynamic and engaging VR battlefield you can literally reach into.
